articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
articles.title: Experts say Telegram's '30 engineers' team is a security red flag - TechCrunch
articles.description: Telegram's founder Pavel Durov says his company only employs around 30 engineers. Security experts say that raises serious questions about the company's cybersecurity.
articles.content: Over the weekend, a clip from a recent interview with Telegrams founder Pavel Durov went semi-viral on X (previously Twitter). In the video, Durov tells right-wing personality Tucker Carlson that he … [+3712 chars]

articles.title: Apple’s App Store breaches EU’s Digital Markets Act - TechCrunch
articles.description: A few months after opening a non-compliance case on Apple and the Digital Markets Act (DMA), the European Commission has shared its preliminary findings
articles.content: A few months after opening a non-compliance case on Apple and the Digital Markets Act (DMA), the European Commission has shared its preliminary findings with Apple. And the bottom line is that the cu… [+3730 chars]

articles.title: Faster Than the Speed of Light: Information Transfer Through “Spooky Action at a Distance” at the Large Hadron Collider - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers have confirmed that quantum entanglement persists between top quarks, the heaviest known fundamental particles. Physicists have demonstrated quantum entanglement in top quarks and their antimatter partners, a discovery made at CERN. This finding e…

articles.title: Mars Helicopter Ingenuity Spots Perseverance Rover During Flight 51 - video Dailymotion - Dailymotion
articles.description: NASA's Mars helicopter Ingenuity flew for the 51st time. The Perseverance rover can be seen in the distance during the flight in an enhanced color image.   Credit: Space.com | footage courtesy: NASA/JPL-Caltech | edited by Steve Spaleta
